snippet: Curry scored 40 points to lead Golden State, which outscored Los Angeles by 70-49 in the second half. The Warriors need two wins to match the best record to start an N.B.A. season.
lead_paragraph: Curry scored 40 points to lead Golden State, which outscored Los Angeles by 70-49 in the second half. The Warriors need two wins to match the best record to start an N.B.A. season.

headline.print_headline: Stephen Curry and Warriors Erase 23-Point Deficit to Beat Clippers and Move to 13-0
headline.main: Stephen Curry and Warriors Erase 23-Point Deficit to Beat Clippers and Move to 13-0
